video_prompt: Sun dips low, casting long shadows of three figures as they turn, their backs to the camera. A rugged SUV navigates a winding desert road, kicking up dust. The sky transitions from fiery orange to soft blue, wispy clouds catching the last rays.
image_prompt: Vertical, vibrant desert landscape at sunrise/sunset with warm golden light. Three backpackers on a rocky outcrop in foreground, backs to viewer, looking at a winding dirt road through canyons. A dark grey off-road SUV on the road. Bright sun with lens flare in background, fiery orange to blue sky with wispy clouds. Adventurous, awe-inspiring mood with dynamic golden light and sharp shadows.
refined_video_prompt: As the sun descends, long shadows rapidly stretch. Three figures dynamically turn away, their backs rotating into view. A rugged SUV maneuvers across the desert terrain, generating a rising cloud of dust. The sky color progressively shifts from intense orange to serene blue, as wispy clouds subtly glow then fade.
